mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ASSIGNMENTS (title, content, assignment_file) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{assignmentFile})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title FROM ASSIGNMENTS WHERE DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, "%Y-%m-%d")=CURDATE() ORDER BY id
SELECT id, title FROM ASSIGNMENTS ORDER BY reg_date DESC
SELECT id, title, content, assignment_file, reg_date FROM ASSIGNMENTS WHERE id = #{assignmentId}
SELECT id, title, content, assignment_file, reg_date FROM ASSIGNMENTS ORDER BY reg_date DESC LIMIT 1
select USER.name from USER LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from ASSIGNMENT_SUBMIT WHERE ref_assignment_id = #{assignmentId}) as b on USER.id=b.ref_user_id WHERE b.ref_user_id is null
select a.id, submit_file, a.reg_date, u.name from ASSIGNMENT_SUBMIT a INNER JOIN USER u on a.ref_user_id = u.id WHERE a.id = #{submitId}
select id, content from COMMENTS WHERE ref_assignment_submit_id = #{submitId}
